title.narrative: Alleviating Poverty in North East Bangladesh

description.narrative: This project will ensure sustainable livelihoods for poor and marginal communities, particularly women, in Northern Bangladesh through improvements to small-scale agriculture. By organising farmers and linking them to information, skills, services and markets, the project will reduce costs of production, increase productivity and improve access to resources. This will lead to a 50% increase in income, directly benefiting 6,000 households (40% women) and their families (30,000 people).;

mailing-address.narrative: Kingsway, Team Valley Trading Estate, Gateshead, NE11 0NE
